featuredStory.name: Grace Mwangi
featuredStory.story: The Roberto Save Dreams Foundation didn't just provide me with an education; they gave me the tools and confidence to become a leader in my community. Today, I run a successful women's cooperative that employs 15 local women and provides educational support to over 50 children.
